prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The tool is positioned as a bridge between technology and people, making programming more accessible to non-technical users. It is described as transforming programming into a creative process that can be accessed by everyone.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}

messages.content:
